name: Billups Design
tag_list: web-agency, chicago-design, chicago-software, software-development, close-loop-marketing, mobile, ecommerce, mobile-commerce, mcommerce, digital-marketing, digital-strategy, web-software, entrepreneur, consulting, interface, social-media, user-experience
overview:
Billups Design is a Chicago-based digital agency that focuses on business consulting, user interface and advertising design and implementation, information architecture, software development, user metrics and optimization. Industries served include sports, retail, travel & hospitality, consumer products as well as other brands and industries. Providing innovative interactive solutions to some of the biggest brands in the world - and to some of Chicago’s most progressive mid-sized companies.

Ted Billups and Charles Stevenson founded Billups Design to give form and function to their curiosity towards all things digital and unique problem-solving talents. In the humble performance of their duties, Ted and Charles have been recognized by many illustrious industry awards-houses, including Creativity International, AIGA Chicago, Horizon Interactive Awards, Internet Media Awards, and American Marketing Association, to name a few.

milestones.description: Senior Business Development specialists Courtney Kurland and Pam Jelaca join the mangement team at Billups Design to widen the agency's industry reach and introduce more agency products into the growing market.

Formalized partnership with Sam Karow and Effective Marketing to develop and execute dynamic digital advertising systems and media planning for clients in hospitality and travel, sports marketing and CPG.
